description: Schema for JSON files generated by ROSMenuLister.

Menu.description: Represents each menu, including the root menu.

summary.description: A summary of the menu, as seen in the list of its parent menu. In the root menu, this contains the RouterOS version, as detected from the pre-prompt screen.

description.description: Description of the menu, as seen in the help for the menu itself, above the list of submenus and commands.

summary.description: A summary of the command, as seen in the help for the menu this command belongs to.

description.description: Description of the command, as seen in the help for the command itself, above the list of arguments.

arguments.description: Arguments that this command may take.

summary.description: Summary of the argument, as seen in the help for the command this argument belongs to.

description.description: Description of the argument, as seen in the help for the argument itself, above the list of values.

unnamed.description: Specifies whether this argument's name can be omitted when using it from the command line.

special.description: Specifies whether this argument is not a normal name=value pair argument. This includes empty arguments, for which there won't be a "values" property, as well as keywords like "where", for which the "values" property will describe the possible starting tokens.

values.description: Raw unparsed text from console's help, describing the possible values for the argument, or if the argument is a keyword (e.g. "where"), describes the first possible token.
